description.zh-cn: 吴宇森执导的香港动作电影，奠定其暴力美学风格，并获得商业和评论上的巨大成功。
description.en: A Hong Kong action film directed by John Woo, which established his style of violent aesthetics and achieved huge commercial and critical success.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名演员，与吴宇森多次合作，主演了《英雄本色》等多部经典影片。
description.en: A famous Hong Kong actor who frequently collaborated with John Woo, starring in classics like 'A Better Tomorrow'.

description.zh-cn: 吴宇森执导的动作电影，为其在国际上赢得了广泛赞誉。
description.en: An action film directed by John Woo that earned him widespread international acclaim.

description.zh-cn: 吴宇森在好莱坞执导的动作惊悚片，由约翰·特拉沃尔塔和尼古拉斯·凯奇主演，取得了巨大的商业成功。
description.en: An action thriller directed by John Woo in Hollywood, starring John Travolta and Nicolas Cage, which was a major commercial success.

description.zh-cn: 美国演员，主演了吴宇森执导的《断箭》和《夺面双雄》。
description.en: An American actor who starred in John Woo's films 'Broken Arrow' and 'Face/Off'.

description.en: A Taiwanese epic film directed by Wei Te-sheng and produced by John Woo.

description.zh-cn: 由于国共内战，吴宇森的家人于1951年从广州逃难至香港。
description.en: Due to the Chinese Civil War, John Woo's family fled from Guangzhou to Hong Kong in 1951.

description.zh-cn: 1953年的石硖尾大火烧毁了吴宇森全家的身份证件，导致他们被迫滞留香港，未能按原计划迁往台湾。
description.en: The Shek Kip Mei fire in 1953 destroyed the identification documents of John Woo's family, forcing them to remain in Hong Kong and preventing their planned move to Taiwan.

description.zh-cn: 在邵氏影业拔擢吴宇森成为其助理导演。
description.en: Promoted John Woo to be his assistant director at Shaw Brothers Studio.

description.en: During a low point in John Woo's career, Tsui Hark invited him to join Cinema City and supported him in directing 'A Better Tomorrow', a turning point in his career.

description.zh-cn: 担任《英雄本色》的导演和编剧。
description.en: Served as the director and screenwriter for 'A Better Tomorrow'.

description.zh-cn: 电影《英雄本色》的成功，极大地提升了主演周润发的知名度。
description.en: The success of the film 'A Better Tomorrow' significantly boosted the stardom of its lead actor, Chow Yun-fat.

description.zh-cn: 吴宇森与周润发是长期合作伙伴，共同创作了《英雄本色》、《喋血双雄》、《纵横四海》等多部经典电影。
description.en: John Woo and Chow Yun-fat are long-term collaborators, having worked together on several classic films including 'A Better Tomorrow', 'The Killer', and 'Once a Thief'.

description.zh-cn: 担任《喋血双雄》的导演。
description.en: Served as the director for 'The Killer'.

description.zh-cn: 担任《夺面双雄》的导演。
description.en: Served as the director for 'Face/Off'.

description.zh-cn: 电影《夺面双雄》的巨大成功帮助当时声名下坠的约翰·特拉沃尔塔重振了演艺事业。
description.en: The huge success of the film 'Face/Off' helped to revive the career of John Travolta, whose fame was declining at the time.

description.zh-cn: 担任电影《赛德克·巴莱》的监制，为导演魏德圣提供战争和动作场面的技术指导。
description.en: Served as the producer for the film 'Seediq Bale', providing technical guidance on war and action scenes to director Wei Te-sheng.

description.zh-cn: 在电影《赛德克·巴莱》的制作过程中，导演魏德圣接受了监制吴宇森在动作场面等方面的技术指导。
description.en: During the production of the film 'Seediq Bale', director Wei Te-sheng received technical guidance on action scenes and other aspects from producer John Woo.
